alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 6:14PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central White Pine and east central Eureka Counties through 700 PM PDT... At 614 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 24 miles east of Eureka Airport, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Diamond Valley and Newark Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County
